pages.text: With at least one bound entity and the potion effect of $(marked)Health Sharing$(), it is possible to equally divide all damage the cultist with said potion effect takes. $(t:Interestingly enough, regenerated health will also be divided among the bound entities...)This damage will then be applied to all bound entities.$()$(br2)There are many ways of obtaining the Health Sharing effect temporarily; however, usually, this is done with a ritual.
